After analyzing the paper, I'll make educated guesses for the requested values based on the information provided in the manuscript.

For the ring width (TASK 1), the paper mentions that they confirm stationary values for diameter, width, azimuthal brightness asymmetry, and floor-to-ring contrast ratio during the seven days. So the width would be consistent across the four observation days.
